more_content:
The celebrated George Thorogood and the Destroyers will grace Key West with a show of high-energy blues ballads as part of the bands' Good to Be Bad Tour on March 8, 2020.

The outdoor performance at the Sunset Green Event Lawn (3820 N. Roosevelt Blvd.) begins at 7 pm and doors at 5:30 pm. Tickets are available ($65-$99) online.

The American singer-songwriter, musician and heck of a performer will perform hits such as “Get A Haircut”, “I Drink Alone”, “One Bourbon, One Scotch, One Beer”, “Move It On Over”, “Who Do You Love” and, lest we forget, “Bad To The Bone." George Thorogood & The Destroyers have played together since 1975, selling more than 15 million records. This year they begin a new adventure as part of the Good To Be Bad Tour: 45 Years Of Rock.

The band will play along with Nick Shnebelen, an upbeat blues rock musician from Kansas City who has a great stage presence that's bound to get the evening started off on a good note.

Guests are encouraged to bring chairs or blankets to lounge on the lawn and enjoy the show. No coolers or outside food and drink permitted. 

The Sunset Green Event Lawn is a multipurpose outdoor space that has been a hub of activity since its recent opening. It’s hosted Grammy award-winning headliners like Rick Springfield and Michael McDonald with events ranging from a silent disco party to a MMA fight night.

At over 12,000 square feet, the outdoor venue is designed to host weddings, concerts, family reunions, movie nights and more, with a capacity of 1,200. Guests who rent the space have flexibility to make it their own with amenities, including tents, dance floors, portable air conditioning units and more.

Additionally, onsite amenities at 24 North Hotel make the Sunset Green Event Lawn perfect for hosting a large group or organizing a corporate event. You and your guests won't have to worry about accommodations and can instead enjoy all the perks of 24 North. An onsite Starbucks and the newly-opened Republica Bar & Lounge is located right off the lobby. Plus, the ease of our hourly shuttle service to Mallory Square makes choosing 24 North a no-brainer.

Read more about upcoming events at the Sunset Green Event Lawn, or read more about the space to host your unique event.

Planning a stay in Key West? Check out our best rates. We have an on-site Starbucks, shuttle service to Old Town every hour, and our pool area is one of the best on the island.
